overview:
Mountain Escapes Properties is an online portal facilitating Cabin Rentals in North Georgia. The portal assists book cabin rentals with all necessary details including the number of guests leasing it and the rooms required. The cabins come fully equipped with kitchens and linens. They are well furnished with hot tubs, mountain views, rock fireplaces, barbeque grills, television sets, pool tables and other game tables.

The cabin rentals at mountain escape properties are located at some of the most scintillating locations near Lake Blue Ridge with the Appalachians for backdrop. The aim is to provide visitors with a wonderful vacation experience where they stay comfortably and enjoy the recreational activities.
